reviews.name: Geeta Verma,
reviews.caption: geetu******@gmail.com
reviews.content: Corbett safari bahut hi memorable tha! Bachhon ne sher ko dekha, dil khush ho gaya. Agle saal phir aana hai.

reviews.name: Nisha Shah
reviews.caption: shah******@gmail.com
reviews.content: Our visit to Agra with TajTrips was unforgettable. The Taj Mahal is even more stunning in person. Must-visit!

reviews.name: Priya Kumari
reviews.caption: priy******@gmail.com
reviews.content: Great experience booking with YatraYojana! Easy navigation and excellent deals. Will definitely use again

reviews.name: Rohit Gupta
reviews.caption: rohi******@gmail.com
reviews.content: Badiya site hai, bahut saare options aur deals milte hain. Maine Shimla ka trip kiya, sab kuchh aasaan aur smooth tha.

reviews.name: Ankit Jain
reviews.caption: ajain******@gmail.com
reviews.content: Highly recommend TripTreats! Found amazing deals for Kerala. Smooth booking process and great customer service

reviews.name: Amit Patel
reviews.caption: amit******@gmail.com
reviews.content: Kafi acchi deals milti hain, maine jaipur ke liye plan kiya tha. Sab kuchh acha tha aur booking bhi jaldi ho gayi.
